title: Worlds In Discord! Prediction Tournament, Viewing Parties and More!

embed.description: Check out the Bu: League OCE community on Discord - hang out with 496 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

body:
Ever thought that Worlds Pick-em just isn't enough? Want to watch the games with a group of people? If you answered yes to either of those, then our discord has what you want! 

To celebrate Worlds 2019, we are running various events for worlds. We have already undertaken a Sweepstake, there will be a voice chat dedicated to watching Worlds games, and we are running a Prediction Tournament. 

The prediction tournament is underway! Once you join the server, go into the #prediction channel to find everything you need to know. The pre-tournament questions are live until the 13th, so you have plenty of time to answer! 

All of the information for all events can be found within the discord. We really hope you enjoy your stay at Bu! 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
